Uses of Package
uno.logic

  • Packages that use uno.logic 
    Package Description
    uno.logic  
    uno.server.core  
  • Classes in uno.logic used by uno.logic 
    Class and Description
    Card
    This class keeps track of all the information about the cards, such as color, type and number.
    Color
    An enum that stores the five different colors a card can be
    Deck
    This class keeps track of the deck, the class can create a deck with all the cards as well as create a "played cards pile" where you put all the played cards
    If the deck runs out of cards it shuffles all the played cards into a new deck.
    In this class is also where you draw cards.
    GameCore
    This class initializes the game by creating a deck, all the players who shall play the game and draws the first card
    When a player chooses a card to play this class makes sure it gets played and also keeps track of all special effects the cards may have
    Also keeps track on whose turn it is and who the next player is depending on the direction of the turn order (clockwise/counterclockwise)
    Player
    Has all info about the players such as their hands, their unique identifier and if they "called UNO" or not
    This class can also draw cards for the player and put it in their hand
    Type
    An enum that stores the types a card can be which determines the kind of special effect it may have
  • Classes in uno.logic used by uno.server.core 
    Class and Description
    Card
    This class keeps track of all the information about the cards, such as color, type and number.
    GameCore
    This class initializes the game by creating a deck, all the players who shall play the game and draws the first card
    When a player chooses a card to play this class makes sure it gets played and also keeps track of all special effects the cards may have
    Also keeps track on whose turn it is and who the next player is depending on the direction of the turn order (clockwise/counterclockwise)
    Player
    Has all info about the players such as their hands, their unique identifier and if they "called UNO" or not
    This class can also draw cards for the player and put it in their hand
